rules_text:
[i]Resolute[/i] – This spell can't be countered. Other creature spells you cast can't be countered.
[i]Unimpeded[/i] – Whenever Dozla, Enduring Axe becomes blocked, you may have him assign combat damage as if he weren't blocked.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Dozla deals combat damage to a player, put a shield counter onto up to one target creature you control.
